Html:
Hi, 
first, sorry for my bad english...


OK, when im calling this function, there is an exception: AccessViolationException.
This problem I've got with all samples with ALVAR.

Whats wrong?

Tim.

If there is a problem in ALVAR itself, you need to contact VTT to get it resolved. Since it works perfectly fine for me, I have no idea what's wrong.

Ohan

My colleague had the same problem, and it seems like he was not using the correct wrapper version. Make sure you use 1.3 wrapper and link to ALVAR 1.3.0 directories. It's probably version mismatch.

Ohan
